title: Ukraine-Russia war updates: Temporary cease-fire declared in in Mariupol, Volnovakha
content:
1. Ukraine-Russia war updates: Temporary cease-fire declared in in Mariupol, Volnovakha  NBC News
  2. Russia announces humanitarian corridors for two Ukrainian cities - BBC News  BBC News
  3. Cease-fire effort in Ukraine collapses amid Russian shelling  Yahoo News
  4. Evacuations in Ukraine halted after Russian cease-fire broken; Volodymyr Zelenskyy warns 'if we fall, you fall': Live updates  USA TODAY
  5. Russia invades Ukraine: Live updates  CNN

localize.title: ウクライナ・ロシア戦争の最新情報。マリウポリ、ヴォルノヴァハで一時的な停戦が宣言された。
乌克兰-俄罗斯战争最新消息。在马里乌波尔和沃尔诺瓦哈宣布临时停火
